name: Damned Brambles!
description:
Damned Brambles! is a game made in three days by three students of Brassart Lyon for the GGJ 2023. This fun game requires to be quick-witted, with both efficiency and nimbleness.

Go and purify your land from these damned brambles !

You can move the character with the classic ZQSD pattern.

Oscar Berry : Programming, Game Design, Particles

Lucas Vaudaine : Level Design, Game Design, Sound Design & Soundtrack

Environment kit : Retro Dungeons - The Forest by Zerin LABS.

Wizard for Battle Polyart, Dungeon Mason

Particles : Luos Eight Elements
